Rock_Hill.Manchester Meadows Soccer Complex:
Manchester Meadows Soccer Complex is a multi field soccer complex containing two stadiums located in Rock Hill, South Carolina.


== About ==
The facility encompasses 70 acres of land and contains two synthetic soccer fields with stadium seating, six natural soccer fields, walking trails, a playground, and several pavilions. Manchester Meadows was completed in 2006 and is currently the home of FC Carolina Discoveries, a soccer team in the National Premier Soccer League.
